questions.question: Cookies
questions.answer: B stone Group uses cookies that help offer you a better service and experience as a user of our website. By continuing to browse our website, you agree to the use of cookies. To ensure that our website presents a good browsing experience for visitors and provide a more personalized service, our server uses cookies to collect and store information. If you wish, you can disable this setting in your browser, subject to limiting access to certain areas of the site or receiving personalized information. The use of cookies is a common practice in most sites in order to save the user time and facilitate navigation. The Website may use cookies in order to collect information during your visit to the website, such as the areas you visit and the activities in which you participate. These files are used to prevent the visitor from having to repeatedly enter their personal information, to facilitate navigation and personalization of the service. Cookies may be used to help know future uses in the application. The user can accept or delete cookies. Most browsers or Internet browsing applications automatically accept cookies. If the user does not intend to use cookies, he must change the settings of his browser regarding the acceptance or not of cookies.

questions.question: Information Collection

All information collected is voluntarily provided either via the website, online forms, questionnaires, service promotions and / or hobbies. B stone Group collects personal data, such as names, addresses, e-mails, telephone numbers, IP addresses, demographic and lifestyle data for the purposes set out below. The entity responsible for the collection and processing of personal data is B stone Group.

questions.answer: B stone Group undertakes to comply with the rules on the processing of personal data in force in Portugal. The information obtained may be used by the B stone Group ,to send you relevant information about current products / promotions, capture general information in order to understand the profile of users, and thereby adapt your products to your customers and potential customers. The data collected is intended exclusively for the use of B stone Group., in order to follow up on requests made through this website, ensuring privacy and protection of users' data. B stone Group You can hand over your personal information to other companies, such as carriers, when you need to do so to provide them with a product or service.

questions.question: Right of Access, Rectification, Cancellation and Opposition
questions.answer: In accordance with the provisions of Law No. 67/98 of 26 October, anyone can request access to the respective personal data, being able to learn about its content, as well as request its rectification, update or request its destruction, by written request addressed to B stone Group to the email address: info@bstone.pt

questions.question: Security and Data Protection
questions.answer: B stone Group undertakes to adopt the necessary security measures to guarantee the safeguarding of users' personal data against possible abuse or unauthorized access. Nevertheless, and since the internet is not a 100% secure means of communication, B stone Group cannot guarantee the security of any information you disclose online, nor be responsible for any loss or damage caused to the user as a result of the loss of confidentiality of the information.
